description: standing fetish; the hands held to the sides of the stomach; large incised features and short beard; an antelope horn set into a cavity in the head; wearing a fibre skirt with dried seed pods suspended and a metal necklet; very fine dark glossy patina
medium: hard wood, vegetable fibre, dried seed pods, copper, finely woven cotton, antelope horn, animal hair, fetish composition
title: Fetish Figure with Antelope Horn
